021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.TNECallbackProvider;
024import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.TNECallbacks;
025import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.currency.CurrencyLoadCallback;
026import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
027import net.tnemc.core.io.message.BaseTranslationProvider;
028import net.tnemc.menu.sponge8.Sponge8MenuHandler;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.api.CallbackManager;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.sponge.SpongePluginCore;
032import net.tnemc.sponge.command.AdminCommand;
033import net.tnemc.sponge.command.CurrencyMoneyCommand;
034import net.tnemc.sponge.command.ModuleCommand;
035import net.tnemc.sponge.command.MoneyCommand;
036import net.tnemc.sponge.command.ShortCommands;
037import net.tnemc.sponge.command.TransactionCommand;
038import net.tnemc.sponge.impl.SpongeEconomy;
039import net.tnemc.sponge.impl.SpongeItemCalculations;
040import net.tnemc.sponge.listeners.player.PlayerCloseInventoryListener;
041import net.tnemc.sponge.listeners.player.PlayerJoinListener;
042import net.tnemc.sponge.listeners.player.PlayerLeaveListener;
043import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
044import org.bstats.sponge.Metrics;
045import org.spongepowered.api.ResourceKey;
046import org.spongepowered.api.Server;
047import org.spongepowered.api.Sponge;
048import org.spongepowered.api.config.ConfigDir;
049import org.spongepowered.api.event.Listener;
050import org.spongepowered.api.event.lifecycle.ConstructPluginEvent;
051import org.spongepowered.api.event.lifecycle.ProvideServiceEvent;
052import org.spongepowered.api.event.lifecycle.StartedEngineEvent;
053import org.spongepowered.api.event.lifecycle.StartingEngineEvent;
054import org.spongepowered.api.event.lifecycle.StoppingEngineEvent;
055import org.spongepowered.api.service.economy.EconomyService;
056import org.spongepowered.api.util.metric.MetricsConfigManager;
057import org.spongepowered.plugin.PluginContainer;
058import org.spongepowered.plugin.builtin.jvm.Plugin;
059import revxrsal.commands.command.CommandActor;
060import revxrsal.commands.command.ExecutableCommand;
061import revxrsal.commands.orphan.Orphans;
062import revxrsal.commands.sponge.SpongeLamp;
063
064import java.nio.file.Path;
065
066/**
067 * The Sponge main plugin class.
068 *
069 * @author creatorfromhell
070 * @since 0.1.2.0
071 */
072
073@Plugin("tne")
074public class SpongeCore extends TNECore {
075
076  protected final SpongePluginCore pluginCore;
077  protected final PluginContainer container;
078  private final Metrics metrics;
079  @Inject
080  @ConfigDir(sharedRoot = false)
081  private Path configDir;
082
083  @Inject
084  private MetricsConfigManager metricsConfigManager;
085
086  @Inject
087  SpongeCore(final PluginContainer container, final Logger log, final Metrics.Factory metricsFactory) {
088
089    this.pluginCore = new SpongePluginCore(container, this, log, new BaseTranslationProvider(), new TNECallbackProvider());
090    this.container = container;
091
092    command = SpongeLamp.builder(container).accept(registerParameters()).build();
093
094    metrics = metricsFactory.make(19246);
095  }
096
097  public static ResourceKey key(final String key) {
098
099    final String[] split = key.split(":");
100
101    final String namespace = (split.length >= 2)? split[0] : "minecraft";
102    final String value = (split.length >= 2)? split[1] : split[0];
103    return ResourceKey.of(namespace, value);
104  }
105
106  @Override
107  public void registerMenuHandler() {
108
109    this.menuHandler = new Sponge8MenuHandler(container, true);
110  }
111
112  @Listener
113  public void onConstruct(final ConstructPluginEvent event) {
114
115    if(hasConsent()) {
116      metrics.startup(event);
117    }
118  }
119
120  @Listener
121  public void onEngineStart(final StartingEngineEvent<Server> event) {
122
123    PluginCore.log().inform("Starting up The New Economy.");
124
125    this.pluginCore.load();
126
127    //Register our event listeners
128    Sponge.eventManager().registerListeners(container, new PlayerJoinListener(container, event.engine().boundAddress().get()));
129    Sponge.eventManager().registerListeners(container, new PlayerLeaveListener(container));
130    Sponge.eventManager().registerListeners(container, new PlayerCloseInventoryListener(container));
131  }
132
133  @Listener
134  public void onServerStart(final StartedEngineEvent<Server> event) {
135    //this.directory = configDir.toFile();
136    pluginCore.enable();
137    PluginCore.log().inform("The New Economy has been enabled.");
138  }
139
140  @Listener
141  public void onServerStop(final StoppingEngineEvent<Server> event) {
142
143    pluginCore.onDisable();
144    PluginCore.log().inform("The New Economy has been disabled.");
145  }
146
147  @Listener
148  public void provideEconomy(final ProvideServiceEvent.EngineScoped<EconomyService> event) {
149
150    event.suggest(SpongeEconomy::new);
151  }
152
153  public PluginContainer getContainer() {
154
155    return container;
156  }
157
158  @Override
159  public void registerCommandHandler() {
160
161    command = SpongeLamp.builder(container).accept(registerParameters()).build();
162  }
163
164  @Override
165  public String commandHelpWriter(final ExecutableCommand executableCommand, final CommandActor commandActor) {
166
167    return "";
168  }
169
170  @Override
171  public void registerCommands() {
172
173    super.registerCommands();
174
175    command.register(new AdminCommand());
176    command.register(new ModuleCommand());
177    command.register(new MoneyCommand());
178    command.register(new ShortCommands());
179    command.register(new TransactionCommand());
180
181    for(final Currency currency : TNECore.eco().currency().currencies()) {
182
183      command.register(Orphans.path(currency.getIdentifier().toLowerCase()).handler(new CurrencyMoneyCommand(currency)));
184    }
185  }
186
187  @Override
188  public void registerConfigs() {
189
190  }
191
192  @Override
193  public void registerCallbacks(final CallbackManager callbackManager) {
194
195    super.registerCallbacks(callbackManager);
196  }
197
198  @Override
199  public SpongeItemCalculations itemCalculations() {
200
201    return new SpongeItemCalculations();
202  }
203
204  public boolean hasConsent() {
205
206    return this.metricsConfigManager.collectionState(this.container).asBoolean();
207  }
208}
